posts.post_content:
For sale is a beautiful 15 card lot of T205 HOFers.  Cards range from G to Vg+.  To my knowledge none have ever been sent in for grading.  Garunteed authentic.

Cy Young --has and Ex+ front but some paper loss on reverse
Bender --vg
Walsh --g
Clarke --Vg-Ex
Matty --Vg-Ex
Baker --Vg
Wheat --Vg
Cobb --Vg
E. Collins -- Vg-Ex
Duffy --vg
Brown --G
Griffith --vg
Marquard --vg
Speaker --Vg

Price for this nice lot of T205's is priced to sell at $1200. SOLD Contact me at [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scans or inquiries.

I'll take them. E-mail on the way.

Thanks

Nice grab Rob....I was happy with the caramel group and was about to get this one too!  I just took a minute too long to think things over.....

Thanks Darren, great cards!
